teamText1: Our team is made up of passionate individuals who love creating unique and meaningful designs. We believe that every t-shirt should tell a story and express something special about the person wearing it.
teamText2: Every member of our team contributes their unique perspective and creativity to our designs, ensuring that each piece reflects our collective vision and values.
teamText3: We're not just selling t-shirts – we're building a community of people who appreciate creativity, quality, and authentic self-expression.
testimonial1: I love how unique these designs are! The quality is amazing and they always get compliments. My new favorite brand!
testimonial2: Finally, t-shirts that actually express my personality. The designs are creative and the fit is perfect. Highly recommend!
testimonial3: Great quality, unique designs, and fast shipping. What more could you ask for? These t-shirts are conversation starters!
creativityDesc: We believe in the power of creative expression and original design
sustainabilityDesc: Committed to eco-friendly practices and responsible production
communityDesc: Building connections through shared experiences and authentic expression
faqSubtitle: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions about our products and services
faqOrderQ1: How do I place an order?
faqOrderA1: You can place an order directly on our website. Simply browse our products, select your size and quantity, add to cart, and proceed to checkout. We accept all major credit cards and PayPal.
faqOrderQ2: How long does it take to process my order?
faqOrderA2: Orders are typically processed within 1-2 business days. You'll receive a confirmation email once your order is shipped with tracking information.
faqOrderA3: Yes, we ship to most countries worldwide. International shipping times vary by location, typically 7-14 business days. Additional customs fees may apply.
faqOrderQ4: What payment methods do you accept?
faqOrderA4: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and Apple Pay. All payments are processed securely.
faqShippingA1: Standard shipping within the US takes 3-5 business days. Express shipping (1-2 business days) is available for an additional fee. International shipping takes 7-14 business days.
faqShippingA2: Yes! We offer free standard shipping on all orders over $50 within the United States. International orders over $100 also qualify for free shipping.
faqShippingQ3: How can I track my order?
faqShippingA3: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can also track your order through your account dashboard on our website.
faqProductQ1: What materials are your t-shirts made from?
faqProductA1: Our t-shirts are made from 100% organic cotton, ensuring comfort, durability, and environmental responsibility. We use high-quality, pre-shrunk fabric that maintains its shape wash after wash.
faqProductQ2: How do I choose the right size?
faqProductA2: We provide detailed size charts for each product. Our t-shirts typically run true to size, but we recommend checking the size chart before ordering. If you're between sizes, we suggest sizing up for a more relaxed fit.
faqProductQ3: Do you offer returns or exchanges?
faqProductA3: Yes, we offer a 30-day return policy for unworn items in original packaging. Exchanges are also available for different sizes or styles. Return shipping is free for US customers.
contactSubtitle: Get in touch with us for any questions or support
hoursDescription: We're closed on weekends and holidays
responsibilitySubtitle: Learn about our commitment to environmental sustainability and social impact
ecoPackagingDesc: We use only recyclable and biodegradable packaging. Our boxes are made from 100% recycled materials.
wasteReductionDesc: We minimize waste in our warehouses and encourage our customers to recycle our packaging.
localPartnersDesc: We prioritize Quebec and Canadian partners to support the local economy and reduce our carbon footprint.
localPartnersStats: Over 80% of our suppliers are based in Quebec
workingConditionsDesc: We ensure all our partners respect international fair labor standards.
localDonationsDesc: We donate 5% of our profits to Quebec charitable organizations each year.
localDonationsStats: Over $50,000 donated to local organizations in 2023
educationalProgramsDesc: We support educational programs in Quebec schools to promote entrepreneurship.
missionText1: At our core, we believe that fashion should be more than just clothing – it should be a form of self-expression that brings joy and confidence to everyone who wears it.
missionText2: We're passionate about creating unique, high-quality t-shirts that not only look great but also tell a story. Every design is carefully crafted to reflect the creativity and individuality of our community.
missionText3: Our mission is to build a brand that celebrates diversity, creativity, and authentic self-expression while maintaining the highest standards of quality and sustainability.
storyText1: It all started with a simple idea: what if we could create t-shirts that were more than just clothing? What if each design could tell a story, spark a conversation, or make someone smile?
storyText2: Founded in Montreal, our journey began with a small team of designers and fashion enthusiasts who shared a common vision. We wanted to create something special – something that would resonate with people who value creativity, quality, and authentic expression.
storyText3: Today, we're proud to have grown into a community of thousands of customers who share our passion for unique, meaningful fashion. Every day, we're inspired by the stories and feedback from our amazing customers.
teamMessageText1: Meet the creative minds behind our unique designs. Our team is made up of passionate individuals who love creating meaningful and beautiful t-shirts.
teamMessageText2: Every member of our team contributes their unique perspective and creativity to our designs, ensuring that each piece reflects our collective vision and values.
teamMessageText3: We're not just selling t-shirts – we're building a community of people who appreciate creativity, quality, and authentic self-expression.
